installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

mv /Archean-server-alpha /mnt/server/Archean-server-alpha

apt update -y
apt install -y curl
curl -o /mnt/server/archean_start.sh https://git.tomatentum.net/tueem/archean-server-pelican/raw/branch/master/archean_start.sh
chmod -R 755 /mnt/server/
